parameters.name: DbInstType
parameters.description: Storage layer type. Valid values: **POLARDB** or **RDS**.

parameters.name: DrdsInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of a DRDS instance.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number of the returned page.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: Search
parameters.description: The ID of the storage or cluster.
